scc_goals.description: Check whether Flow Logs for VPC are enabled

scc_goals.description:: Check whether OpenShift clusters are accessible only by using private endpoints
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This is a valid issue - tracking in https://github.ibm.com/GoldenEye/issues/issues/174

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Kubernetes Service clusters are enabled with IBM Log Analysis
scc_goals.ignore_reason: False alarm. In order to have more control over the way observability agents are configured and deployed, a helm chart installation is used rather than the native provider support.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Kubernetes Service clusters are enabled with IBM Cloud Monitoring
scc_goals.ignore_reason: False alarm. In order to have more control over the way observability agents are configured and deployed, a helm chart installation is used rather than the native provider support.
